title: 2912 14th Avenue - Unit 103, Oakland, CA
posting_body: An Oakland Studio Apartment - That’s Right
On Trend, Pet Friendly
2912 14th Avenue - Unit 103
Oakland, California 94606
Available for immediate occupancy is a light, bright, and airy studio apartment featuring a neutral color scheme, and stainless steel appliances located in Oakland at 2912 14th Avenue - Unit 103.

This studio apartment is in close proximity to Park Blvd, Glenview District, Walking distance to Marzano, Paulista, coffee shops, close to 580 freeway for quick trips to San Francisco and less than 20-minutes from San Francisco, and only 10-minutes to Berkeley.

This on-trend updated Oakland studio rental apartment is in close proximity to MacArthur Parkway and BART for easy commuting and offers convenient on-site laundry facilities and off-street parking availability.

Nearby amenities include restaurants, museums, retail stores, Trefethen Aquatic Center, Roberts Regional Recreational Area, Dimond Park, Alameda Island, and plenty of other activities and leisurely pursuits.

Lease Requirements:
Minimum 1-year lease of $1,895.00 per month
A security deposit of $1,900.00 is required.
Parking space w/ included a garage for storage available at $75.00 extra per month
The tenant is required to carry renters insurance and list the owner/landlord as an additional insured
PETS ALLOWED with a pet security deposit
No smoking
Tenant pays electric, gas, water, cable/landlord pays garbage
